{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question asks about the largest faciolingual dimension. The relevant documents mention various dimensions such as occlusal vertical dimension, mesiodistal direction, and buccolingual direction. According to the document, this method separates proteins on the basis of molecular weight in the second dimension.
